Experienced Teacher Competency Table

Domain Competency Description
Commitment to Pupils and Pupil Learning 1 Teachers demonstrate commitment to the well-being and development of all pupils. Should see in class observation
2 Teachers are dedicated in their efforts to teach and support pupil learning and achievement. Should see in class observation
3 Teachers treat all pupils equitably and with respect. Should see in class observation
4 Teachers provide an environment for learning that encourages pupils to be problem solvers, decision makers, lifelong learners, and contributing members of a changing society. Should see in class observation
Professional Knowledge 5 Teachers know their subject matter, the Ontario curriculum, and educationrelated legislation. Should see in class observation
6 Teachers know a variety of effective teaching and assessment practices Should see in class observation
7 Teachers know a variety of effective classroom management strategies Should see in class observation
8 Teachers know how pupils learn and the factors that influence pupil learning and achievement. Should see in class observation
Teaching Practice 9 Teachers use their professional knowledge and understanding of pupils, curriculum, legislation, teaching practices, and classroom management Should see in class observation
10 Teachers communicate effectively with pupils, parents, and colleagues. Should see in class observation
11 Teachers conduct ongoing assessment of pupilsâ€™ progress, evaluate their achievement, and report results to pupils and their parents regularly. Post observation discussion
12 Teachers adapt and refine their teaching practices through continuous learning and reflection, using a variety of sources and resources. Should be in your Annual Learning Plan
13 Teachers use appropriate technology in their teaching practices and related professional responsibilities. Should see in class observation
Leadership and Community 14 Teachers collaborate with other teachers and school colleagues to create and sustain learning communities in their classrooms and in their schools. Post observation discussion
15 Teachers work with professionals, parents, and members of the community to enhance pupil learning, pupil achievement, and school programs. Post observation discussion
Ongoing Professional Learning 16 Teachers engage in ongoing professional learning and apply it to improve their teaching practices. Should be in your Annual Learning Plan
